metadata.title: Kohler K-8624-0 Kitchen Pot and Pan Dish Scraper, Silicone and Nylon, Heat Resistant, White and Charcoal, One SIze
features: Hard nylon edge for scraping baked-on food and tough messes
Soft silicone edge is safe for cleaning nonstick cookware
Silicone edge is heat-resistant to 400 Degree F
Hard nylon edge for scraping baked-on food and tough messes
description: This two-in-one scraper fits nicely in your hand functions as a versatile dish cleaning tool. Use the hard edge for scraping off baked-on messes; use the soft edge for wiping away residue and cleaning nonstick surfaces.
